thread.title: Sprint - T-Mobile merger talks back on

title: Sprint - T-Mobile merger talks back on
text:
Sprint - T-Mobile merger talks back on Wednesday, April 11, 2018 - 01:36 
Sprint has restarted talks to merge with T-Mobile US in the latest effort to bring together the fourth and third largest U.S. wireless carriers, sources told Reuters. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Sprint has restarted talks to merge with T-Mobile US in the latest effort to bring together the fourth and third largest U.S. wireless carriers, sources told Reuters. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
